ygData.msgSnippet: Tyrael nods his thanks at Kaiser and turns to The Dragoon. More than adequate, it seemed. The assault would prove devastating when it would happen. Tyrael: It

Tyrael nods his thanks at Kaiser and turns to The Dragoon. More than
adequate, it seemed. The assault would prove devastating when it would
happen.

Tyrael: It is a good thing, the, Dragoon. We will attack soon enough.
Are you willing to serve the Tripredacus cause, then?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Rudra656@a... wrote:
> ::Kaiser/The Dragoon::
>        Kaiser shrugs his shoulders indolently.  "He says he is the
Dragoon, 
> and that he would like to speak with you.  That's all I know."  He
steps to 
> the back of the room and leans against a wall back to his former,
calmer, 
> darker self.  "He looks like an adequate warrior from here but I'm not 
> certain."
> 
>        Meanwhile the Dragoon steps forward to stand in front of
Tyrael.  "We 
> are the Dragoon.  We live only to fight and serve.  We have no
affiliation.  
> Who may we kill?"  He crosses his arms over his chest and waits for his 
> command.
